title: Flytoget - Technical Assistance Type 78
content: RailAdvice provided technical assistance for Flytoget's acquisition of eight new Type 78 train sets from the Spanish manufacturer CAF. The trains, with a top speed of 245 km/h, are the fastest in Norway. Lars Bengtsson, a RAMS and LCC engineer, was involved in verifying maintenance activities, planning to reduce workshop time, and quality-assuring documentation. Erlend Rehn was the technical project manager for the project.

title: Bane NOR - RAMS Signal
content: RailAdvice provides RAMS consulting services to multiple Bane NOR signaling projects. Robin Reiten, a senior consultant, works as a RAMS advisor on these projects. His tasks include facilitating risk analysis, controlling supplier work, and preparing documentation for the Norwegian Railway Authority (Statens jernbanetilsyn).

title: Bybanen Utvikling - Safety Manager
content: In December 2023, RailAdvice was awarded a framework agreement for the role of safety manager for Bybanen Utvikling. Senior consultant Fredrik Schumann is responsible for this role.

title: Norske tog - Project Documentation
content: Ole Johansen was the Project Documentation Manager for the acquisition of new local trains from Alstom for Norske tog.

title: Sporveien - Tramway Fleet Upgrade
content: Lars Mortvedt is the project manager for upgrading Sporveien's tramway machine fleet. Other consultants involved include Ali Reza Rogha, Ingmar Hemsen, and Henning Brustad.

title: Lars Bengtsson
content: Lars Bengtsson is a RAMS and LCC engineer at RailAdvice. He was involved in Flytoget's Type 78 train acquisition project, focusing on verifying maintenance, reducing workshop time, and quality-assuring documentation.

title: Erlend Rehn
content: Erlend Rehn is a technical project manager at RailAdvice. He served in this role during Flytoget's acquisition of new Type 78 trains from CAF.

title: Robin Reiten
content: Robin Reiten is a senior consultant and RAMS advisor at RailAdvice. He works on multiple signaling projects for Bane NOR, handling risk analysis and documentation for the Norwegian Railway Authority.

title: Fredrik Schumann
content: Fredrik Schumann is a senior consultant at RailAdvice who has been responsible for the safety manager role for Bybanen Utvikling since December 2023.

title: Ole Johansen
content: Ole Johansen was the Project Documentation Manager for Norske tog's acquisition of new local trains from Alstom.

title: Lars Mortvedt
content: Lars Mortvedt is a project manager at RailAdvice who is currently responsible for upgrading Sporveien's tramway machine fleet.
